content.json:
# Dataminr Alert Overview
### Watchlists created in Dataminr

parameters.name: watchlist
parameters.label: Watchlist
parameters.query:
DataminrPulseCyberAlerts
| mv-expand todynamic(WatchlistsMatchedByType)
| where isnotempty(WatchlistsMatchedByType["name"])
| distinct tostring(WatchlistsMatchedByType["name"])

content.json: This dashboards shows high level analytics about the Dataminr alerts from the selected Watchlist.

content.query:
DataminrPulseCyberAlerts
| where ('*' == ('{watchlist}') or set_has_element(todynamic(WatchlistNames),'{watchlist}')) and isnotempty(AlertType)
| summarize distinct_count=dcount(AlertId) by AlertType
| sort by distinct_count desc
content.title: Alerts by Type
content.noDataMessage: No data found in selected timerange.

content.query:
DataminrPulseCyberAlerts
| where ('*' == ('{watchlist}') or set_has_element(todynamic(WatchlistNames),'{watchlist}'))
| mv-expand todynamic(Company)
| extend companyName =  tostring(Company["name"])
| where isnotempty(Company)
| summarize Count=dcount(AlertId) by companyName
| sort by Count desc
content.title: Alerts by Company
content.noDataMessage: No data found in selected timerange.

content.json: üí° _Click on a bars in the above 'Alert by Type' chart to view more details_

content.query:
DataminrPulseCyberAlerts
| where ('*' == ('{watchlist}') or set_has_element(todynamic(WatchlistNames),'{watchlist}'))
    and isnotempty(AlertType) and AlertType == '{alert_type}'
| summarize count=dcount(AlertId) by AlertType
content.title: Selected Alerts Type Data
content.noDataMessage: No data found in selected timerange.

parameters.name: Category_name
parameters.label: Category Name
parameters.query:
DataminrPulseCyberAlerts 
| mv-expand todynamic(Category)
| extend categories = tostring(Category["name"])
| where ('*' == ('{watchlist}') or set_has_element(todynamic(WatchlistNames),'{watchlist}')) and isnotempty(categories)
| distinct categories

content.query:
DataminrPulseCyberAlerts 
| mv-expand todynamic(Category)
| extend Date = format_datetime(todatetime(TimeGenerated), 'yyyy-MM-dd'), CategoryName = tostring(Category["name"])
| where ('*' == ('{watchlist}') or set_has_element(todynamic(WatchlistNames),'{watchlist}')) and ('*' in ({Category_name}) or CategoryName in ({Category_name})) and isnotempty(CategoryName)
| summarize Dcount=dcount(AlertId) by Date, CategoryName
| project Date, Dcount, CategoryName
| order by Date asc
content.title: Alerts Trend
content.noDataMessage: No data found in selected timerange.

content.query:
DataminrPulseCyberAlerts
| where ('*' == ('{watchlist}') or set_has_element(todynamic(WatchlistNames),'{watchlist}')) and isnotempty(EventLocationName) and isnotempty(WatchlistsMatchedByType)
| summarize dcount=dcount(AlertId) by Latitude, Longitude, EventLocationName
| extend latlng = strcat("Latitude : ",Latitude,"\nLongitude : ",Longitude,"\nName : ",EventLocationName,"\nCount : ",dcount)
| order by dcount desc
content.title: Alerts by Location
content.noDataMessage: No data found in selected timerange.

content.json: üí° _Click on a data points in the above 'Alerts Trend' chart to view more details_

content.query:
DataminrPulseCyberAlerts 
| extend TimeGenerated = tostring(TimeGenerated), Channel = substring(SourceChannels,1,strlen(SourceChannels)-2), category = parse_json(Category), embededLabels = parse_json(EmbeddedLabels)
| mv-apply category on (summarize Topics = make_list(category.name))
| mv-apply embededLabels on (summarize addresses = make_list(embededLabels.addresses))
| extend CategoryName = array_index_of(Topics,'{CategoryName_Occurrence_Trend}'), Date = format_datetime(todatetime(TimeGenerated), 'yyyy-MM-dd')
| where TimeGenerated contains '{date_Occurrence_Trend}' and CategoryName >= 0 and ('*' == ('{watchlist}') or set_has_element(todynamic(WatchlistNames),'{watchlist}'))
| summarize any(*) by AlertId, Date
| project-rename ["Alert ID"] = AlertId, ["Alert Type"] = any_AlertType, ["Category Names"] = any_Topics, Companies = any_Company, ["Cyber Addresses"] = any_addresses, ["Location Name"] = any_EventLocationName, ["Matched Watchlist"] = any_WatchlistNames, Source = any_EventSource, ["Source Channels"]= any_Channel, ["Publisher Name"] = any_PublisherCategoryName, ["Time Generated"] = any_TimeGenerated, Caption = any_Caption
| project ["Alert ID"], ["Alert Type"], Caption, ["Category Names"], Companies, ["Cyber Addresses"], ["Location Name"], format_datetime(todatetime(["Time Generated"]), 'yy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), ["Matched Watchlist"], Source, parse_json(["Source Channels"]), ["Publisher Name"]
| sort by ["Time Generated"] asc
content.title: Selected Alerts Trend Data
content.noDataMessage: No data found in selected timerange.

content.query:
DataminrPulseCyberAlerts
| where ('*' == ('{watchlist}') or set_has_element(todynamic(WatchlistNames),'{watchlist}'))
| extend EventTime = unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(toint(EventTime)), Channel = substring(SourceChannels,1,strlen(SourceChannels)-2)
| summarize any(*) by AlertId
| project-rename ['Alert ID'] = AlertId, Time = any_TimeGenerated, ["Alert Type"] = any_AlertType, Source = any_EventSource, ["Source Channels"]= any_Channel, Publisher = any_PublisherCategoryName, Caption = any_Caption, Company = any_CompanyNames, Topics = any_CategoryNames
| project ['Alert ID'], format_datetime(todatetime(Time), 'yy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), ["Alert Type"], Caption, Company, Source, parse_json(["Source Channels"]), Publisher, Topics
| order by Time desc
| limit 10
content.title: Recent 10 Alerts
content.noDataMessage: No data found in selected timerange.

# Dataminr Close Proximity Overview
### Show Dataminr alerts in close proximity of important Customer locations

This dashboards shows Dataminr alerts within threshold miles from important customer locations.

The important customer locations are configured as part of Sentinel Watchlist. The Watchlist file is included as part of this app.

Please update the Watchlist file manually.

content.query:
_GetWatchlist('DataminrPulseAsset')
| extend crossjoin = 1
| join kind=inner (DataminrPulseAlerts | extend crossjoin = 1) on crossjoin
| extend asset_distance_miles = abs(3956 * (2 * asin(sqrt(pow(sin(((Latitude*pi()/180)-(todouble(asset_lat)*pi()/180)) / 2),2) + cos((Latitude*pi()/180)) * cos((todouble(asset_lat)*pi()/180)) * pow(sin(((Longitude*pi()/180)-(todouble(asset_long)*pi()/180)) / 2),2)))))
| where asset_distance_miles <= toreal(alerting_distance_miles)
| summarize any(asset_name), dcount=dcount(AlertId) by AlertId, tostring(asset_lat), tostring(asset_long)
| extend latlng = strcat("Name : ",any_asset_name,"\nLatitude : ",asset_lat,"\nLongitude:   ",asset_long)
| order by asset_lat desc
content.title: Alerts in Close Proximity Map
content.noDataMessage: No data found in selected timerange.

content.query:
_GetWatchlist('DataminrPulseAsset')
| extend crossjoin = 1
| join kind=inner (DataminrPulseAlerts | extend crossjoin = 1) on crossjoin
| extend asset_distance_miles = abs(3956 * (2 * asin(sqrt(pow(sin(((Latitude*pi()/180)-(todouble(asset_lat)*pi()/180)) / 2),2) + cos((Latitude*pi()/180)) * cos((todouble(asset_lat)*pi()/180)) * pow(sin(((Longitude*pi()/180)-(todouble(asset_long)*pi()/180)) / 2),2)))))
| where asset_distance_miles <= toreal(alerting_distance_miles)
| project-rename ["Asset Name"] = asset_name, ["Asset Type"] = asset_type, ["Alert ID"] = AlertId, ["Asset Distance Miles"] = asset_distance_miles
| project ["Asset Name"], ["Asset Type"], Caption, ["Alert ID"], ["Asset Distance Miles"]
content.title: Alerts in Close Proximity
content.noDataMessage: No data found in selected timerange.

content.json: üí° _Click on a row in the above 'Alerts in Close Proximity' grid to view more details_

content.query:
DataminrPulseAlerts
| where AlertId == '{alertid}'
content.title: Selected Close Proximity Alert Data

content.query:
_GetWatchlist('DataminrPulseAsset')
| project-rename ["Asset Name"] = asset_name, ["Asset Type"] = asset_type, ["Asset Description"] = asset_description, ["Alerting Distance Miles"] = alerting_distance_miles, ["Asset Latitude"] =  asset_lat, ["Asset Longitude"] = asset_long
| project ["Asset Name"], ["Asset Type"], ["Asset Description"], ["Alerting Distance Miles"], ["Asset Latitude"], ["Asset Longitude"]
content.title: Configured Important Locations

# Dataminr IOC Overview
### IOCs (IP, URL, domain, hashes, filenames) extracted from alerts created by Dataminr

This dashboards shows Indicator of Compromise in the current Sentinel environment.

Each row in the panels showing vulnerable IOCs are clickable. Click the row to view more details about the vulnerable IOC.
#### üìù Note: To view the Affected IOCs related panles in this dashboard, ASim parsers must be deployed in the workspace and lookup csv data must be available in watchlist.

content.query:
union isfuzzy=true
(ASimNetworkSession
    | where EventVendor !contains_cs("Dataminr")
    | summarize  src_ip = make_set(SrcIpAddr), dst_ip = make_set(DstIpAddr)
    | summarize ip = make_set(set_union(src_ip, dst_ip))),
(ASimDns
    | where EventVendor !contains_cs("Dataminr")
    | summarize  src_ip = make_set(SrcIpAddr), dst_ip = make_set(DstIpAddr)
    | summarize ip = make_set(set_union(src_ip, dst_ip))),
(ASimWebSession
    | where EventVendor !contains_cs("Dataminr")
    | summarize  src_ip = make_set(SrcIpAddr), dst_ip = make_set(DstIpAddr)
    | summarize ip = make_set(set_union(src_ip, dst_ip))),
(ASimAuditEvent
    | where EventVendor !contains_cs("Dataminr")
    | summarize  src_ip = make_set(SrcIpAddr), dst_ip = make_set(TargetIpAddr)
    | summarize ip = make_set(set_union(src_ip, dst_ip)))
| mv-expand ip
| where isnotempty(ip)
| extend ip = tostring(ip)
| join kind=inner (_GetWatchlist("DataminrPulseVulnerableIp")
                    | project ip, caption) on ip
| project-rename ["ASIM Ip"] = ip, ["Lookup Ip"] = ip1
| summarize ip_count=dcount(["ASIM Ip"])
| project ip_count
content.title: Affected IP Address
content.noDataMessage: No data found in selected timerange.

content.query:
union isfuzzy=true
(imFileEvent
    | where EventVendor !contains_cs("Dataminr")
    | summarize src_md5=make_set(SrcFileMD5), src_sha1=make_set(SrcFileSHA1), src_sha256=make_set(SrcFileSHA256), src_sha512=make_set(SrcFileSHA512), dst_md5=make_set(TargetFileMD5), dst_sha1=make_set(TargetFileSHA1), dst_sha256=make_set(TargetFileSHA256), dst_sha512=make_set(TargetFileSHA512)
    | summarize  Hashes = make_set(set_union(src_md5, src_sha1, src_sha256, src_sha512, dst_md5, dst_sha1, dst_sha256, dst_sha512))
    | project Hashes),
(ASimProcessEvent
    | where EventVendor !contains_cs("Dataminr")
    | summarize src_md5=make_set(ParentProcessMD5), src_sha1=make_set(ParentProcessSHA1), src_sha256=make_set(ParentProcessSHA256), src_sha512=make_set(ParentProcessSHA512), dst_md5=make_set(TargetProcessMD5), dst_sha1=make_set(TargetProcessSHA1), dst_sha256=make_set(TargetProcessSHA256), dst_sha512=make_set(TargetProcessSHA512), act_md5 = make_set(ActingProcessMD5), act_sha1=make_set(ActingProcessSHA1), act_sha256=make_set(ActingProcessSHA256), act_sha512=make_set(ActingProcessSHA512)
    | summarize  Hashes = make_set(set_union(src_md5, src_sha1, src_sha256, src_sha512, dst_md5, dst_sha1, dst_sha256, dst_sha512, act_md5, act_sha1, act_sha256, act_sha512))
    | project Hashes),
(ASimWebSession
    | where EventVendor !contains_cs("Dataminr")
    | summarize file_md5=make_set(FileMD5), file_sha1=make_set(FileSHA1), file_sha256=make_set(FileSHA256), file_sha512=make_set(FileSHA512)
    | summarize Hashes = make_set(set_union(file_md5, file_sha1, file_sha256, file_sha512))
    | project Hashes)
| mv-expand Hashes
| where isnotempty(Hashes)
| extend Hashes = tostring(Hashes)
| join kind=inner (_GetWatchlist('DataminrPulseVulnerableHash')
                    | project Hashes=SearchKey, caption) on Hashes
| project-rename ["ASIM Hashes"] = Hashes, ["Lookup Hashes"] = Hashes1
| summarize hash_count = dcount(["ASIM Hashes"])
| project hash_count
content.title: Affected Hashes
content.noDataMessage: No data found in selected timerange.

content.query:
union isfuzzy=true
(ASimWebSession
    | where EventVendor !contains_cs("Dataminr")
    | project url=Url),
(imFileEvent
    | where EventVendor !contains_cs("Dataminr")
    | project url = TargetUrl),
(ASimAuditEvent
    | where EventVendor !contains_cs("Dataminr")
    | project url = TargetUrl)
| join kind=inner (_GetWatchlist('DataminrPulseVulnerableDomain')
                    | project url, caption) on url
| project-rename ["ASIM URLs"] = url, ["Lookup URLs"] = url1
| summarize domain_count=dcount(["ASIM URLs"])
| project domain_count
content.title: Affected Domains
content.noDataMessage: No data found in selected timerange.

content.query:
union isfuzzy=true
(ASimAuditEvent
    | where EventVendor !contains_cs("Dataminr")
    | extend malware = ThreatName
    | project malware),
(ASimNetworkSession
    | where EventVendor !contains_cs("Dataminr")
    | extend malware = ThreatName
    | project malware),
(ASimDns
    | where EventVendor !contains_cs("Dataminr")
    | extend malware = ThreatName
    | project malware),
(ASimWebSession
    | where EventVendor !contains_cs("Dataminr")
    | extend malware = ThreatName
    | project malware)
| join kind=inner (_GetWatchlist('DataminrPulseVulnerableMalware')
                    | project malware, caption) on malware
| project-rename ["ASIM Malwares"] = malware, ["Lookup Hashes"] = malware1
| summarize malware_count= dcount(["ASIM Malwares"])
| project malware_count
content.title: Affected Malwares

content.query:
union isfuzzy=true
(ASimNetworkSession
    | where EventVendor !contains_cs("Dataminr")
    | extend ip = pack_array(SrcIpAddr, DstIpAddr)
    | project ip, EventSchema, EventVendor, EventProduct, TimeGenerated, EventSeverity, EventType),
(ASimDns
    | where EventVendor !contains_cs("Dataminr")
    | extend ip = pack_array(SrcIpAddr, DstIpAddr)
    | project ip, EventSchema, EventVendor, EventProduct, TimeGenerated, EventSeverity, EventType),
(ASimWebSession
    | where EventVendor !contains_cs("Dataminr")
    | extend ip = pack_array(SrcIpAddr, DstIpAddr)
    | project ip, EventSchema, EventVendor, EventProduct, TimeGenerated, EventSeverity, EventType),
(ASimAuditEvent
    | where EventVendor !contains_cs("Dataminr")
    | extend ip = pack_array(SrcIpAddr, TargetIpAddr)
    | project ip, EventSchema, EventVendor, EventProduct, TimeGenerated, EventSeverity, EventType)
| mv-expand ip
| where isnotempty(ip)
| extend ip = tostring(ip)
| join kind=inner (_GetWatchlist("DataminrPulseVulnerableIp")
                    | project ip, caption) on ip
| project ["Ip Addresses"]=ip, EventSchema, EventVendor, EventProduct, TimeGenerated, EventSeverity, EventType, caption
content.title: Affected IP Address Details

content.query:
union isfuzzy=true
    (imFileEvent
        | where EventVendor !contains_cs("Dataminr")
        | extend Hashes = pack_array(SrcFileMD5, SrcFileSHA1, SrcFileSHA256, SrcFileSHA512, TargetFileMD5, TargetFileSHA1, TargetFileSHA256, TargetFileSHA512)
        | project Hashes, EventSchema, EventVendor, EventProduct, EventSeverity, EventType),
    (ASimProcessEvent
        | where EventVendor !contains_cs("Dataminr")
        | extend Hashes= pack_array(ParentProcessMD5, ParentProcessSHA1, ParentProcessSHA256, ParentProcessSHA512, ActingProcessMD5, ActingProcessSHA1, ActingProcessSHA256, ActingProcessSHA512, TargetProcessMD5, TargetProcessSHA1, TargetProcessSHA256, TargetProcessSHA512)
        | project Hashes, EventSchema, EventVendor, EventProduct, EventSeverity, EventType ),
    (ASimWebSession
        | where EventVendor !contains_cs("Dataminr")
        | extend Hashes = pack_array(FileMD5, FileSHA1, FileSHA256, FileSHA512)
        | project Hashes, EventSchema, EventVendor, EventProduct, EventSeverity, EventType)
| mv-expand todynamic(Hashes)
| where isnotempty(Hashes)
| extend Hashes = tostring(Hashes)
| join kind=inner (_GetWatchlist('DataminrPulseVulnerableHash')
                    | project Hashes=SearchKey, caption) on Hashes
| project Hashes, EventSchema, EventVendor, EventProduct, EventSeverity, EventType, caption
content.title: Affected Hashes Details

content.query:
DataminrPulseCyberAlerts
| extend embededLabels = parse_json(EmbeddedLabels)
| mv-apply embededLabels on (summarize addresses = make_list(embededLabels.data.addresses))
| mv-apply addresses on (summarize ip = make_list(addresses.ip))
| where isnotempty(ip)
| mv-expand ip
| summarize Count=count_distinct(AlertId) by tostring(ip)
| project-rename ["IP Addresses"] = ip
| order by Count desc

content.query:
DataminrPulseCyberAlerts
| extend embededLabels = parse_json(EmbeddedLabels)
| mv-apply embededLabels on (summarize hashValues = make_list(embededLabels.data.hashValues))
| mv-apply hashValues on (summarize Hash=make_list(hashValues.value))
| where isnotempty(Hash)
| mv-expand Hash
| summarize Count=count_distinct(AlertId) by tostring(Hash)
| order by Count desc

content.query:
DataminrPulseCyberAlerts
| extend embededLabels = parse_json(EmbeddedLabels)
| mv-apply embededLabels on (summarize urls = make_list(embededLabels.data.URLs))
| where isnotempty(urls)
| extend Domain = extract_all(@'\"?(?:[^"]*https*:\/\/)*((w*\.))*((?P<subdomain>[a-z-A-Z0-9-]+)\.)*(?P<domain>(?:\w+(?:\.|\[\.\])(?:com|co|org|gov|int|edu|mil|net)(?:(?:\.|\[\.\])\w{1,3})*)|\d+(?:(?:\.|\[\.\])\d+){2}|[a-z-A-Z0-9-]+(?:\.|\[\.\])\w+)(?:\/[^"]*)*\"?[,\n\]]',dynamic(['domain']),tostring(urls))
| where isnotempty(Domain)
| mv-expand Domain
| summarize Count=count_distinct(AlertId) by tostring(Domain)
| mv-expand todynamic(Domain)
| order by Count desc
content.title: Dataminr: Vulnerable Domains

# Dataminr Cyber Threat Overview
### Cyber alerts created by Dataminr

content.query:
let trendline=toscalar(DataminrPulseCyberAlerts
| mv-expand todynamic(Category)
| extend selectedTopic = Category["name"]
| where selectedTopic in ("Advanced Persistent Threats","Ransomware","Hacktivists") 
| extend selectedAllTopics = parse_json('["Advanced Persistent Threats","Ransomware","Hacktivists"]')

content.query:
DataminrPulseAlerts
| where isnotempty(Latitude) and isnotempty(Longitude) 
    and ('*' == ('{location}') or EventLocationName == ('{location}'))
    and ('*' == ('{event_source}') or EventSource == ('{event_source}'))
    and ('*' == ('{company}') or set_has_element(todynamic(CompanyNames),'{company}'))
    and ('*' == ('{severity}') or AlertType == ('{severity}'))
    and ('*' == ('{topic}') or  set_has_element(todynamic(CategoryNames), '{topic}'))
    and ('*' == ('{watchlist}') or set_has_element(todynamic(WatchlistNames),'{watchlist}'))
    and  ('{search_keyword:label}' == '*' or (* has '{search_keyword:label}'))
| summarize any(EventLocationName), distinct_count=dcount(AlertId) by tostring(Latitude), tostring(Longitude)
| extend latlng = strcat("Name: ",any_EventLocationName,"\nLatitude: ",Latitude,"\nLongitude: ",Longitude)
| order by distinct_count desc
content.title: Alerts Location Map

content.query:
DataminrPulseAlerts
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(14d) and TimeGenerated <=ago(7d)
| where ('*' == ('{location}') or EventLocationName == ('{location}'))
    and ('*' == ('{event_source}') or EventSource == ('{event_source}'))
    and ('*' == ('{company}') or set_has_element(todynamic(CompanyNames),'{company}'))
    and ('*' == ('{severity}') or AlertType == ('{severity}'))
    and ('*' == ('{topic}') or  set_has_element(todynamic(CategoryNames), '{topic}'))
    and ('*' == ('{watchlist}') or set_has_element(todynamic(WatchlistNames),'{watchlist}'))
    and  ('{search_keyword:label}' == '*' or (* has '{search_keyword:label}'))
| mv-expand todynamic(Category)
| extend Topics = Category["name"]
| where ('*' == ('{topic}') or  Topics == '{topic}')
| summarize dcount(AlertId) by tostring(Topics)
| project Topics, dcount_AlertId
| join kind=rightouter (DataminrPulseAlerts 
        | where TimeGenerated >= ago(7d)
        | where ('*' == ('{location}') or EventLocationName == ('{location}'))
            and ('*' == ('{event_source}') or EventSource == ('{event_source}'))
            and ('*' == ('{company}') or set_has_element(todynamic(CompanyNames),'{company}'))
            and ('*' == ('{severity}') or AlertType == ('{severity}'))
            and ('*' == ('{topic}') or  set_has_element(todynamic(CategoryNames), '{topic}'))
            and ('*' == ('{watchlist}') or set_has_element(todynamic(WatchlistNames),'{watchlist}'))
            and  ('{search_keyword:label}' == '*' or (* has '{search_keyword:label}'))
        | mv-expand todynamic(Category)
        | extend Topics = Category["name"]
        | where ('*' == ('{topic}') or  Topics == '{topic}')
        | summarize dcount(AlertId) by tostring(Topics)
        | project Topics, dcount_AlertId) on Topics
| extend WeekTrendvalue = dcount_AlertId1 - dcount_AlertId
| extend WeekTrend = iff(WeekTrendvalue > 0,strcat("+",WeekTrendvalue),tostring(WeekTrendvalue))
| project Topic=Topics1, ["Week Trend"]=WeekTrend, Count=dcount_AlertId1
| order by Count desc

content.query:
DataminrPulseAlerts
| where ('*' == ('{location}') or EventLocationName == ('{location}'))
    and ('*' == ('{event_source}') or EventSource == ('{event_source}'))
    and ('*' == ('{company}') or set_has_element(todynamic(CompanyNames),'{company}'))
    and ('*' == ('{severity}') or AlertType == ('{severity}'))
    and ('*' == ('{topic}') or  set_has_element(todynamic(CategoryNames), '{topic}'))
    and ('*' == ('{watchlist}') or set_has_element(todynamic(WatchlistNames),'{watchlist}'))
    and  ('{search_keyword:label}' == '*' or (* has '{search_keyword:label}'))
| extend dt = unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(EventTime)
| extend Time = format_datetime(dt,'MM-dd-yy HH:mm:ss')
| summarize any(*) by AlertId
| extend Caption = replace_string(any_Caption,"\n"," ")
| project-rename ["Alert Type"] = any_AlertType
| project Caption, ["Alert Type"], Time=any_Time, ["Source Link"] = any_PostLink
| order by Time desc

content.query:
let CyberAddresses = toscalar(
DataminrPulseAlerts
| mv-expand todynamic(EmbeddedLabels)
| where ('*' == ('{location}') or EventLocationName == ('{location}'))
    and ('*' == ('{event_source}') or EventSource == ('{event_source}'))
    and ('*' == ('{company}') or set_has_element(todynamic(CompanyNames),'{company}'))
    and ('*' == ('{severity}') or AlertType == ('{severity}'))
    and ('*' == ('{topic}') or  set_has_element(todynamic(CategoryNames), '{topic}'))
    and ('*' == ('{watchlist}') or set_has_element(todynamic(WatchlistNames),'{watchlist}'))
    and  ('{search_keyword:label}' == '*' or (* has '{search_keyword:label}'))
| extend Addresses = tostring(parse_json(EmbeddedLabels.data.addresses))
| summarize any(*) by AlertId
| extend Caption = replace_string(any_Caption,"\n"," ")
| where any_Caption == ```{SelectedCaption}```
| sort by AlertId
| project any_Addresses
);
let Vulnerabilities = toscalar(
DataminrPulseAlerts
| mv-expand todynamic(EmbeddedLabels)
| where ('*' == ('{location}') or EventLocationName == ('{location}'))
    and ('*' == ('{event_source}') or EventSource == ('{event_source}'))
    and ('*' == ('{company}') or set_has_element(todynamic(CompanyNames),'{company}'))
    and ('*' == ('{severity}') or AlertType == ('{severity}'))
    and ('*' == ('{topic}') or  set_has_element(todynamic(CategoryNames), '{topic}'))
    and ('*' == ('{watchlist}') or set_has_element(todynamic(WatchlistNames),'{watchlist}'))
    and  ('{search_keyword:label}' == '*' or (* has '{search_keyword:label}'))
| extend Vulnerabilities = parse_json(EmbeddedLabels.data.vulnerabilities)
| mv-apply Vulnerabilities on (summarize VulnerabilitiesId = make_list(Vulnerabilities.id))
| summarize any(*) by AlertId
| extend Caption = replace_string(any_Caption,"\n"," ")
| where any_Caption == ```{SelectedCaption}```
| sort by AlertId
| project any_VulnerabilitiesId

    and ('*' == ('{event_source}') or EventSource == ('{event_source}'))

let total = toscalar(DataminrPulseAlerts
| mv-expand todynamic(EmbeddedLabels)
| where ('*' == ('{location}') or EventLocationName == ('{location}'))
    and ('*' == ('{event_source}') or EventSource == ('{event_source}'))
    and ('*' == ('{company}') or set_has_element(todynamic(CompanyNames),'{company}'))
    and ('*' == ('{severity}') or AlertType == ('{severity}'))
    and ('*' == ('{topic}') or  set_has_element(todynamic(CategoryNames), '{topic}'))
    and ('*' == ('{watchlist}') or set_has_element(todynamic(WatchlistNames),'{watchlist}'))
    and  ('{search_keyword:label}' == '*' or (* has '{search_keyword:label}'))
| extend addresses = parse_json(EmbeddedLabels.data.addresses)
| mv-apply addresses on (summarize ip=make_list(addresses.ip))
| mv-expand ip
| summarize dcount(AlertId) by tostring(ip)
| summarize total=sum(dcount_AlertId)
| project total);
DataminrPulseAlerts
| mv-expand todynamic(EmbeddedLabels)
| where ('*' == ('{location}') or EventLocationName == ('{location}'))
    and ('*' == ('{event_source}') or EventSource == ('{event_source}'))
    and ('*' == ('{company}') or set_has_element(todynamic(CompanyNames),'{company}'))
    and ('*' == ('{severity}') or AlertType == ('{severity}'))
    and ('*' == ('{topic}') or  set_has_element(todynamic(CategoryNames), '{topic}'))
    and ('*' == ('{watchlist}') or set_has_element(todynamic(WatchlistNames),'{watchlist}'))
    and  ('{search_keyword:label}' == '*' or (* has '{search_keyword:label}'))
| extend addresses = parse_json(EmbeddedLabels.data.addresses)
| mv-apply addresses on (summarize ip=make_list(addresses.ip))
| mv-expand ip
| where isnotempty(ip)
| summarize dcount(AlertId) by tostring(ip)
| extend Percent = 100*todouble(dcount_AlertId)/total
| project-rename Count = dcount_AlertId
| project ["IP Address"]=ip, Count, Percent
| order by Percent desc
| limit 10
content.title: Top 10 Exploiting IP Addresses
